Instruction: Cut the chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces.
In a bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper.
Add the chicken pieces to the marinade and toss to coat.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
Thread marinated chicken pieces and black grapes onto skewers.
Grill the skewers for 6-8 minutes per side, or until the chicken is cooked through and the grapes are slightly caramelized.
Remove from the grill and let rest for a few minutes before serving.
Serve hot as a flavorful side dish.
